english.segment1: Every time I come back to this rock, You've reminded me that I am not alone, That I will never be alone. And when I turn to see that the tides have changed, That people change, and I am not the same, No I will never be the same.
english.segment2: Hey did you know, that you fed my soul, The day that you opened up to me. And I just couldn't be still, and tie down my will, I just wanted to run with you, with you.
english.segment3: And I thank my God every time I remember you. And I thank my God every time I remember you.
english.segment4: And when I start to think about you and me and how we came to be, I start to think about time and how we made it through fine. And then I turn to see that the times have changed, That people change and I am not the same, No I will never be the same.
english.segment5: Hey did you know, that you fed my soul, The day that you opened up to me. And I just couldn't be still and tie down my will, I just wanted to run with you, with you.
english.segment6: And I thank my God every time I remember you. And I thank my God every time I remember you. I remember you, yes I remember you.
english.segment7: Yes I thank my God every time I remember you. And I thank my God every time I remember you. And I thank my God every time I remember you. And I thank my God every time I remember you. I remember you, yes I remember you. I remember you, I remember you.
english.segment8: Ever since you stepped foot on this rock, You know it doesn't really matter how you came, We will never be the same.
